Publication Title: Comparative analysis of cell-cell communication at single-cell resolution
Publication Authors: Aaron J Wilk, Alex K Shalek, Susan Holmes, Catherine A Blish
Publication Abstract: Inference of cell-cell communication from single-cell RNA sequencing data is a powerful technique to uncover intercellular communication pathways, yet existing methods perform this analysis at the level of the cell type or cluster, discarding single-cell-level information. Here we present Scriabin, a flexible and scalable framework for comparative analysis of cell-cell communication at single-cell(Read more on Pubmed)
Publication Assay: Flow Cytometry, Single Cell RNA-Sequencing, CRISPR, Computational Tool
